Physical Analysis of the Gridded Ocean (PAGO) aims to compare the temperature, salinity and velocity fields of gridded ocean models outputs along pre-defined sections.

Overview General presentation

References List of publications

Models Description of inputs models

Grid Description of grid subset

Sections Description of sections

Areas Description of areas

Output Description of output
schema

PAGO is distributed with Matlab and Python sources and documentations.

MAPAGO MATLAB implementation

PyPAGO Python implementation
